hero.title: VaoCa — Smart HR Management Solution for SMEs
hero.subtitle: Transform your workforce management with seamless attendance tracking, from time clocks to mobile devices. Experience faster, smarter, and more efficient HR management — all in one powerful platform.
how.title: How it works — Who is it for?
how.for_managers.title: For Managers
how.for_managers.desc: Efficiently manage shifts, staff assignments, leave approvals, and comprehensive reports through our intuitive mobile or web interface.
how.for_staff.title: For Employees
how.for_staff.desc: Seamlessly clock in using your smartphone, access work schedules, and manage leave requests with ease.
